pr_title: fix(plugins): Fixes for SpinnakerPluginInfo, front50 update repository, and other minor issues

timeline.message: fix(plugins): Fixes for reading remote SpinnakerPluginInfo and other minor issues
fix(plugins): Fixes for reading remote SpinnakerPluginInfo and other minor issues

timeline.bodyText: This basically ensures we have a decent configuration process such that if front50.baseUrl is already defined in the config the operator does not need to add the url to spinnaker.extensibility.repositories.front50.url.
timeline.author: jonsie
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -60,6 +61,21 @@ public static UpdateRepository pluginFront50UpdateRepository(
                         "Unable to bind ok-http-client property to "
                             + OkHttpClientConfigurationProperties.class.getSimpleName()));
 
+    URL defaultFront50Url =
+        Binder.get(environment)
+            .bind("front50.base-url", Bindable.of(URL.class))
+            .orElseThrow(
+                () ->
+                    new BeanCreationException(
+                        "Unable to bind front50.base-url property to "
+                            + URL.class.getSimpleName()));
+
+    PluginRepositoryProperties front50RepositoryProps =
+        pluginRepositoriesConfig.get(PluginsConfigurationProperties.FRONT5O_REPOSITORY);
+
+    URL front50Url =
+        defaultFront50Url != null ? defaultFront50Url : front50RepositoryProps.getUrl();
+

timeline.message: fix(plugins): Minor refactor to disable UpdateManager installPlugin and updatePlugin usage

timeline.bodyText: applicationContext.getApplicationName() was returning null.  It didn't seem to be reading spring.application.name, this approach works though.
timeline.author: jonsie
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,21 +87,18 @@ public static UpdateRepository pluginFront50UpdateRepository(
             .configure(SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT, true)
             .setSerializationInclusion(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL);
 
-    PluginRepositoryProperties front50RepositoryProps =
-        pluginRepositoriesConfig.get(PluginsConfigurationProperties.FRONT5O_REPOSITORY);
-
     Front50Service front50Service =
         new Retrofit.Builder()
             .addConverterFactory(JacksonConverterFactory.create(objectMapper))
-            .baseUrl(front50RepositoryProps.getUrl())
+            .baseUrl(front50Url)
             .client(okHttpClient)
             .build()
             .create(Front50Service.class);
 
     return new Front50UpdateRepository(
         PluginsConfigurationProperties.FRONT5O_REPOSITORY,
-        applicationContext.getApplicationName(),
-        front50RepositoryProps.getUrl(),
+        Objects.requireNonNull(environment.getProperty("spring.application.name")),

timeline.message: fix(plugins): Update PluginUpdateServiceTest and remove obsolete comment
